FuncDef: This command configures the IPv6 prefix used to derive the IPv6 address from the IPv4 address, and is same as the prefix used by DNS64 to generate AAAA record returned for IPv4 endpoint resolution. NAT64 node announces this prefix in routing to attract traffic from IPv6 hosts. If the prefix is not configured, then a well-known prefix, 64:FF9B::/96, is used.
